creator: Hopgrade
descriptionHtml:
hOp helps you make the most of the communities you are already a part of. We make it simple to ask for help and connect with others. Gotta move a couch? Borrow a bike pump? Find a running buddy? Help others and get connected in your trusted hOp community!

What can hOp help you do?

- Chat up your neighbors in your community feed
- Stay informed with community announcements and updates
- Save time with quick access to community resources and tools
- Ask for a favor or lend a hand to a neighbor
- Conveniently buy, sell or trade items with people nearby
- Get discounts at your favorite local shops with hOp Community exclusive perks

hOp stands for ‘helping Other people’.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Improved Community Member Safety
* Report content and block other members to ensure a safe community experience
* Direct Message Enhancements
* Send a message directly through for-sale posts to ask questions and schedule pick-ups
* Bug Fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Group messaging is here. Users can select multiple users from shared communities and start a conversation. Name the conversation and add a photo for the group. You will be able to view user in the group, add more users to the group as well as leave the conversation. Grab some community members and start a conversation!
